name: Team Player
description: Awarded to players who have proven themselves to be a great ally. These players support the alliance and show a level of commitment that goes above and beyond.

name: Worthy Adversary
description: Awarded to players who are a great adversaries, gracious in defeat or victory. These players are tough and if the circumstances may have changed, would have been great allies.

name: Diplomat
description: Awarded to players who are cunning with diplomacy. These players have a way with words, can strike a seemingly fair bargain and can sow discord in rival alliances.

name: Master Strategist
description: Awarded to players who are proven to be skillful in strategy and tactical play. These players can pull off clever moves to tip the balance of war in their favour.

name: Masquerade
description: Awarded to players who are adept with many identities. They build interesting characters, stories and lore behind their chosen race and are a joy to converse with.

name: Dauntless
description: Awarded to players who are tough, ruthless and aggressive. They show great courage and never give up, even in the face of defeat.

name: Sleepless
description: Awarded to players who always have an ever watchful eye on the galaxy. These players know all and see all.
